paper_abstract: We study the convergence of Solomonoff's universal mixture on individual Martin-Lof random sequences. A new result is presented extending the work of Mutter and Muchnik [3] by showing that there does not exist a universal mixture that converges on all Martin-Lof random sequences. We show that this is not an artifact of the fact that the universal mixture is not a proper measure and that the normalised universal mixture also fails to converge on all Martin-Lof random sequences. Crown Copyright (C) 2015 Published by Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On Martin-Lof (non-)convergence of Solomonoff's universal mixture
